translation.en: [officer 1, on radio] 3654. We have foot pursuit outside of PNC Park.
translation.it: 3654. Inseguimento a piedi fuori dal PNC Park.

translation.en: [officer 2] 3169, here on Stockton Avenue. Heading down.
translation.it: 3169 su Stockton Avenue. Va verso sud.

translation.en: [officer 3] 438972. Suspect description, black jacket, black pants.
translation.it: 438972. L'obiettivo indossa giacca nera e pantaloni neri.

translation.en: [officer 4] Mayor requests we lock down. Lock it down on all four corners.
translation.it: Il sindaco chiede di circondarlo da tutti i lati.

translation.en: [officer 3] Copy.
[officer 5] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.it: Obiettivo a piedi. Ripeto, a piedi.

translation.en: [officer 6] Can we confirm present location of suspect?
[officer 5] Got eyes on the suspect. Following.
[officer 7] Dispatch, 3227. Be advised, suspect is entering PNC Park.
translation.it: Centrale, 3227. L'obiettivo sta entrando nel PNC Park.

translation.en: [officer 8] Suspect carrying backpack moving through PNC.
translation.it: L'obiettivo ha con sé uno zaino sospetto.

translation.en: [officer 9] On the move!
[officer 10] Clear the area! Get out of my way!
translation.it: Abbiamo qualcuno di sopra? Io sono sul posto.

translation.en: -[officer 11, on radio] I'm on-site. -[officer 12] Move!
translation.it: Abbiamo qualcuno di sopra? Io sono sul posto. Spostatevi!

translation.en: [officer 13, on radio] Unit One-Two. I got your call. Negative.
We have no visual. We have got no ID at this time.
translation.it: Non lo vediamo. Non l'abbiamo identificato.

translation.en: [officer 14, on radio] Suspect is on the roof.
Officers in pursuit.
[officer 12] Ray!
Just come with me, okay?
I'm here to help.
It's over.
Just…
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
No, no, no, no!
[Ray, echoing] The past is like a dream.
translation.it: Il passato è come un sogno.

translation.en: -[birds singing] -[water flowing]
[Ray] There are memories that shape us,
translation.it: Ci sono ricordi che ci modellano,

translation.en: molding us into what we've become.
A mosaic of images and feelings that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.it: Un mosaico di immagini ed emozioni che rivela come siamo arrivati dove siamo.

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
translation.it: Anche se i dettagli diventano sfocati.

translation.en: -You know this is all yours? -[Young Rachel chuckles]
translation.it: Sai che questo è tutto tuo?

translation.en: What ya lookin' at, man?
I'm lookin' at you, woman.
-I love you. -[Young Rachel] Love you too.
[Ray] As the years pass, we realize
we are nothing more than the experiences that made us.
translation.it: capiamo che le nostre esperienze ci hanno formati.

translation.en: -[doctor] Hi, Amanda. -Hi.
-[Ray] Doc. -[doctor] Mr. Cooper.
Is it back?
[doctor] Yes. We'll go over the options,
but Infirmam is still the most effective way to cure this type of cancer.
translation.it: ma l'Infirmam rimane la cura più efficace, in questi casi.

translation.en: We've already leveraged everything.
[Ray] The pain has brought us closer together.
translation.it: Il dolore ci ha uniti ancora di più.

translation.en: And watching her grow… has been to find myself again.
translation.it: E guardando Rachel crescere, ho ritrovato me stesso.

translation.en: [all] Surprise!
Here, mama. This is for you.
I mean, it's not much, but it's all they had at the gift shop.
translation.it: Non è molto, ma non avevano altro all'emporio.

translation.en: -Oh. -[Amanda] Her name is Paloma. No, it's perfect. Thank you, Mom.
translation.it: - Si chiama Paloma. - Mamma, è perfetto. Grazie.

translation.en: [Ray] But sometimes I wonder,
"Are these my memories,
or are they hers?"
-[Ray grunting] -[coach] Put your hips into it. Again.
-[Ray grunts] Ooh. -[laughs] Ooh, that was clean.
-Lock that wrist so it don't get weak. -It won't!
translation.it: - Blocca il polso per mantenerlo forte. - Ok.

translation.en: There are no rules in a fight, people do not--
translation.it: Non ci sono regole nella lotta e…

translation.en: -Whoa! -Fight fair!
-[both grunt] -[Ray] How do you win an unfair fight?
translation.it: Come si vince una lotta sleale?

translation.en: -[Rachel] You always fight harder. -That's right.
[man] Let me train her, Coop. She's got what it takes.
-That's my sweet girl. -[laughs]
-[Rachel] Done. -Done?
Thank you, baby.
[Ray] Parents and their children.
Where do we stop and they begin?
translation.it: Dove finiamo noi e dove iniziano loro?

translation.en: Mr. Cooper. Ray.
-Doc. -I have good news.
We just got word a very effective generic version of Infirmam, called Spero,
translation.it: Pare ci sia un generico dell'Infirmam molto efficace chiamato Sperio

translation.en: is in the final stages of FDA approval.
[softly] This is great news, Ray.
Did you do this?
-You did, didn't you? -[Rachel] What?
This was your birthday wish, wasn't it? [kisses]
translation.it: È il tuo desiderio di compleanno?

translation.en: I love you. Let's go tell Mom.
translation.it: Ti voglio bene. Diciamolo alla mamma.

translation.en: We were supposed to start a new medication.
You know when that's supposed to happen?
I… You'll have to talk with Dr. Wu.
[Rachel] Dad, what's happening?
[Ray] Dr. Wu?
Dr. Wu!
-[Wu] Hi, Ray. -What's goin' on?
translation.it: Salve, Ray. Amanda doveva iniziare il nuovo trattamento, oggi.

translation.en: You said Amanda was gonna start Spero soon.
translation.it: Amanda doveva iniziare il nuovo trattamento, oggi.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Amanda's on my list of patients to see.
The company that makes the generic drug
pulled it off the market.
What are you talkin' about?
BioPrime, the makers of Infirmam,
paid the manufacturer to delay Spero's release.
translation.it: ha pagato il produttore per bloccare Sperio.

translation.en: -Delay? -For how long?
Indefinitely.
You told me that my wife was gonna be okay.
translation.it: Mi ha detto che mia moglie sarebbe guarita.

translation.en: I am delivering the same news to three other patients today…
translation.it: Devo dare la stessa notizia ad altri tre pazienti, oggi,

translation.en: [quietly] …two of them kids.
I am so sorry.
I'm sorry.
-[news fanfare plays] -[host] Welcome back. For those just joining, I'm here with BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.it: Bentornati. Siamo qui, oggi, con l'A.D. della BioPrime, Simon Keeley,

translation.en: and Congresswoman Diana Morgan of Pennsylvania.
translation.it: e la deputata della Pennsylvania, Diana Morgan.

translation.en: Congresswoman Morgan, why are you here today?
translation.it: Deputata Morgan, perché è qui oggi?

translation.en: Well, I've always taken a hard line against pharmaceutical lobbies
translation.it: Mi sono sempre opposta alle lobby farmaceutiche

translation.en: and mass corporations, like BioPrime.
translation.it: e alle multinazionali come la BioPrime.

translation.en: With all due respect, Congresswoman,
BioPrime is unlike any other pharmaceutical company in the world.
translation.it: la BioPrime è diversa dalle altre aziende farmaceutiche.

translation.en: -[TV volume raises] -[Keeley] Our scientists have created
the most effective treatments in the fight against cancer.
translation.it: i trattamenti più efficaci nella lotta contro il cancro.

translation.en: Specifically with Infirmam, a drug that has increased life expectancy
translation.it: Nello specifico con Infirmam, che ha aumentato l'aspettativa di vita

translation.en: in 86% of patients treated.
Mr. Keeley, it is not the efficacy that's in question.
translation.it: Signor Keeley, non è in discussione la sua efficacia,

translation.en: It's the business practices. It's the company's business practices.
I believe that we all have a basic human right to safe, affordable medication.
translation.it: Ogni persona ha diritto ad aver accesso a farmaci sicuri e abbordabili.

translation.en: Yeah. Um, this talking point of health care as a human right.
translation.it: Lei parla di sanità come diritto umano.

translation.en: Our medicines, they are a matter of research and science.
translation.it: Le nostre medicine sono frutto di ricerca scientifica.

translation.en: The investment is not only risky, it is extremely expensive.
translation.it: Un investimento non soltanto rischioso, ma anche molto costoso.

translation.en: [Langley] All right. We have eager callers that wanna weigh in.
[caller] Can you please explain? Because I just don't understand.
translation.it: Può spiegarmi una cosa? Perché non capisco.

translation.en: It's crazy that a pill can cost that much.
translation.it: È assurdo che una pillola possa costare tanto.

translation.en: -Yeah, this is, uh, a tricky issue. -[line ringing]
Uh, and don't get fooled by the talking points of… of politicians from Washington.
translation.it: Ma non fatevi ingannare dai discorsi dei politici di Washington.

translation.en: Mr. Keeley, according to your own internal documents,
translation.it: Signor Keeley, secondo i suoi documenti interni,

translation.en: the cost of an entire course of treatment is only four dollars.
translation.it: il costo del trattamento è di soli 4 dollari.

translation.en: You're absolutely right. A… A course of treatment is four dollars.
translation.it: Ha ragione. Un ciclo di trattamento costa 4 dollari.

translation.en: But it's funny how you failed to mention the billions of dollars spent on…
translation.it: Ma è buffo che lei non citi i miliardi di dollari spesi…

translation.en: -[operator] Your name? -Ray Cooper.
…rebates, discounts, insurance companies, wholesalers. Look,
I'm here because BioPrime
translation.it: Io sono qui perché la BioPrime

translation.en: is committed to healing the world.
translation.it: si impegna a guarire il mondo.

translation.en: And if you look at the numbers, that is exactly what we're doing.
translation.it: Dai numeri, è esattamente quello che stiamo facendo.

translation.en: -[scoffs] That is not what you are doing. -All right.
translation.it: - Non è affatto vero. - Va bene.

translation.en: Just to interject, our next caller is from Pittsburgh.
Ray, do you have something to say to Mr. Keeley?
My wife is dying in a hospital because you pulled Spero off the market.
translation.it: Mia moglie sta morendo perché hai fatto ritirare Sperio.

translation.en: Paying competitors to shelve generic brands of drugs?
translation.it: Pagare la concorrenza per non far produrre un generico?

translation.en: [scoffs] That is immoral, Mr. Keeley.
Well… [clears throat]
Is it-- Should-- Can I? Uh, I just wanna talk to Ray directly.
Listen.
Uh, first of all, I'd just like to say I'm so sorry to hear about your wife.
translation.it: Innanzitutto, voglio dirti che mi dispiace per tua moglie.

translation.en: Uh, believe it or not, BioPrime is dedicated to saving lives.
translation.it: Che ci crediate o no, l'interesse della BioPrime è salvare vite.

translation.en: Saving lives? You're geared towards makin' a profit.
translation.it: Ah, sì? A me sembra che vi interessi solo il profitto.

translation.en: We've already refinanced our house. I've taken every double shift I can get.
translation.it: Abbiamo ipotecato la casa, faccio doppi turni di continuo.

translation.en: You've already taken everything from me!
translation.it: Tu mi hai portato via tutto!

translation.en: [Keeley] Ray, the sad reality is that cancer
translation.it: Ray, la triste realtà è che il cancro spesso è una condanna a morte.

translation.en: is still very often a death sentence.
translation.it: la triste realtà è che il cancro spesso è una condanna a morte.

translation.en: In the short term, what would we give?
[hesitates] What is the cost
translation.it: Qual è il prezzo da pagare

translation.en: of spending just a little bit more time with a loved one?
translation.it: per passare un altro po' di tempo con la persona amata?

translation.en: A year, a… a month, a day?
translation.it: Un anno, un mese, un giorno?

translation.en: Mmm, it's impossible to put a price on.
If my wife dies, it's your death sentence.
translation.it: Se mia moglie muore, sarà tua la condanna a morte.

translation.en: I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.it: Ti troverò e ti ucciderò con le mie mani.

translation.en: [Rachel] Dad?
[weakly] What ya lookin' at, man?
[softly] I'm lookin' at you, woman.
Oh God!
[shouting] No!
Fuck, no!
Amanda, no!
[softly] Bye.
-[Ray] Ah, God damn it. -[Rachel] What? Hospital bill?
Just… put it at the bottom of the pile.
-We can't ignore it. -[Rachel] Sure you can.
translation.it: Non possiamo ignorarla. Certo che sì. Abbiamo votato per la sanità pubblica.

translation.en: -[stove clicks] -We voted for universal health care. Just…
translation.it: Certo che sì. Abbiamo votato per la sanità pubblica. Lo facciamo per presa di posizione politica.

translation.en: tell 'em we're taking a political stance.
translation.it: Lo facciamo per presa di posizione politica.

translation.en: No, we are not eating that three nights in a row.
translation.it: No, non possiamo mangiarle per tre sere di fila.

translation.en: -C'mon. You know you love this too. -[Ray] It's not happening.
translation.it: E dai, piacciono anche a te. Non esiste. Ordineremo qualcosa con della verdura.

translation.en: We're gonna order something with vegetables.
translation.it: Non esiste. Ordineremo qualcosa con della verdura.

translation.en: -[Rachel laughing] -Fries do not count.
-[Rachel] Hey! -No. Stop.
-Ah! Stop ticklin' me. -[cell phone vibrates]
[Ray chuckles] Stop it.
-Hello? -[man on phone] Ray Cooper?
My name is Martin Bennett. I'm a journalist for VICE.
translation.it: Sono Martin Bennett, giornalista di Vice.

translation.en: I'm doing a story on BioPrime, and I saw your call with Simon Keeley on TV.
translation.it: Scrivo una storia sulla BioPrime, ho sentito la tua chiamata a Keeley.

translation.en: [Ray] What do you want?
I can help you get justice for what happened to your wife.
No, you can't. I've been down that road.
translation.it: No, non puoi, ci ho già provato.

translation.en: I have proof that crimes have been committed.
translation.it: Ho le prove di crimini commessi.

translation.en: Crimes that can land some very powerful people in jail.
translation.it: Crimini che manderanno qualcuno in prigione.

translation.en: -Keeley? -Who's that?
Especially Keeley. We need to talk in person.
translation.it: Soprattutto Keeley. Dobbiamo parlare di persona.

translation.en: -You can talk now. Now you have me. -Not over the phone.
translation.it: - Puoi parlare adesso. Sono qui. - Non al telefono.

translation.en: Meet me at Gateway Station in 20 minutes. I won't waste your time.
translation.it: Vediamoci a Gateway Station tra 20 minuti. Fidati.

translation.en: -[call disconnects] -[Rachel] Who was that?
[Ray] I'll be right back.
What do you want? Chinese or Subway?
No, it's cool. I'll come with you, and we can pick it up on the way.
translation.it: Vengo con te e prendiamo qualcosa in giro.

translation.en: Not gonna happen, Rae. Sit there and finish that homework.
translation.it: Tu resta qui e fai i compiti.

translation.en: [Rachel] That's not fair.
Life's not fair.
Chinese?
Lock the door behind me.
-I love you. -Love you. [sighs]
[Ray] Excuse me.
Yeah, I'm here. Where are you?
-[Bennett] Get on the incoming train. -[Ray] You were supposed to meet me here.
translation.it: - Sali sul treno in arrivo. - Dovevamo vederci qui.

translation.en: Trust me, Ray. Just get on the train.
Are you on the train?
-Yeah. Now what? -Don't hang up. Just stay on the line.
translation.it: - Sei salito? - Sì. E ora? Non riagganciare, resta in linea.

translation.en: Just sit tight.
Get off at this station.
Okay, where now?
There's a woman in a striped coat and a hipster guy with a scarf.
translation.it: C'è una donna col cappotto a righe e un tipo con la sciarpa.

translation.en: -You see where they're headed? -Yeah. To street level.
translation.it: - Vedi dove vanno? - Al piano di sopra.

translation.en: All right. There's a guy in a denim jacket going up the stairs.
translation.it: Bene. C'è un tizio con la giacca di jeans, sulle scale.

translation.en: I want you to follow that guy. Hang back, but don't lose him.
Stand by.
Head to the south platform
translation.it: Vai alla piattaforma sud e prendi la linea rossa verso Allegheny.

translation.en: and take the Red Line towards Allegheny Station. Okay?
translation.it: Vai alla piattaforma sud e prendi la linea rossa verso Allegheny. Ok?

translation.en: Stay on the line.
-Bennett? -Yeah. Martin.
translation.it: - Bennett? - Sì. Scusa per i cambi di treno, ma è per precauzione.

translation.en: Look, sorry about all this train hopping, but it's just a precaution.
translation.it: Scusa per i cambi di treno, ma è per precauzione.

translation.en: Okay, honestly,
I'm a little afraid of how deep this thing might go.
What does that mean?
I got a source who told me about BioPrime's payouts
translation.it: Una fonte mi ha detto dei pagamenti della BioPrime

translation.en: to multiple offshore shell corporations.
Bribery, cover-ups, who knows what else. All this leads to Simon Keeley.
translation.it: Corruzione, insabbiamenti, eccetera. Tutto porta a Simon Keeley.

translation.en: There are other players at both the state and federal level.
translation.it: Ci sono altri nomi a livello statale e federale,

translation.en: But recently, communication went silent.
translation.it: ma ultimamente la mia fonte è sparita.

translation.en: You told me you had proof.
[Bennett] Enough to tie Keeley to bribes that pulled Spero off the market.
translation.it: Posso collegare Keeley alle mazzette per bloccare Sperio,

translation.en: But without my source, I can't connect the dots.
You're wastin' my time.
[Bennett] I have enough to bring public concern against BioPrime, but I do not have enough to take them down.
translation.it: Posso esporre la storia pubblicamente, ma non ho abbastanza per fermarli.

translation.en: That's why I need you, your story.
translation.it: Per questo mi serve la tua testimonianza.

translation.en: -I just-- -Look, just think about it.
Look, "Local family gets ravaged by Big Pharma's greed."
translation.it: "Famiglia locale devastata dall'avidità di Big Pharma."

translation.en: [Bennett] You gotta help me, Ray.
Family, human interest. That's what grabs headlines. We can blow this thing wide open.
translation.it: Famiglia. Interessi umani. Questo fa notizia. Li smaschereremo.

translation.en: We can take down BioPrime. We can bring Simon Keeley to his knees.
translation.it: Possiamo fermare la BioPrime e anche Simon Keeley.

translation.en: -Hey! -[blade swishes]
Dad!
Run!
Hey!
[groans] Rachel. Rachel, baby, are you okay? Look at me.
-[coach] Just like your dad. -[Rachel grunting]
-Not about strength. -[both grunting]
Okay, top. Top. Up, up, up!
Hands up. Hands up. Move.
Again. Hit him again. Control him. Let's go.
Come on. You can take anyone.
Beautiful. There it is.
Nice. Top, top, top, top! Watch the scramble.
All right.
Hooks in. Get it. Get him in. Here.
Pick your shots.
That's it. Open him up.
-[both grunt] -[coach] You got it. Lock it in.
Beautiful.
Just hold. Hold, hold.
[coach] He's tapping, Rachel.
Rachel, he's tapping.
-He's tapping, Rachel. Rachel! -[sounds fading]
[coach] Rachel!
[coach] Rachel!
Today, I am thrilled to announce a bipartisan bill
translation.it: Oggi sono lieta di annunciare una legge bipartisan

translation.en: that will make true progress in the war to find a cure for cancer.
translation.it: che porterà un vero progresso nella cura contro il cancro.

translation.en: In collaboration with the CDC and the NIH,
translation.it: In collaborazione con il CDC e l'istituto di Sanità,

translation.en: we are creating a strategic partnership with BioPrime Pharmaceuticals.
translation.it: stiamo creando una partnership con la BioPrime Pharmaceuticals.

translation.en: Thanks to the effort of BioPrime CEO, Simon Keeley,
translation.it: Grazie all'impegno di Simon Keeley, l'A.D. della BioPrime,

translation.en: and chairman, Vinod Shah,
this bill will effectively cap the cost of treatment.
translation.it: questa legge porrà un limite massimo ai costi di trattamento.

translation.en: Finally, many of BioPrime's breakthrough treatments
translation.it: Finalmente, le cure all'avanguardia della BioPrime,

translation.en: that used to cost in the hundreds of thousands of dollars
translation.it: che prima costavano centinaia di migliaia di dollari,

translation.en: will now be available to the public at affordable prices.
translation.it: saranno disponibili al pubblico a un prezzo abbordabile.

translation.en: I told the American people that I would hold companies like BioPrime accountable,
translation.it: Avevo detto agli americani che le aziende avrebbero pagato,

translation.en: and I have delivered on that promise.
We are cleaning out the rot.
[Ray] Again?
I wasn't watching it. You were.
I had a dream last night about that trip we took with Mom in the woods.
translation.it: Ieri notte ho sognato la gita nel bosco con la mamma.

translation.en: My memory's kind of fading of her.
translation.it: Il suo ricordo è sempre più sfocato.

translation.en: I don't know. It's like I'm losing these tiny pieces of her every day, and I just…
translation.it: È come se perdessi dei pezzettini di lei ogni giorno e io…

translation.en: I don't know. I miss her. I miss our family.
translation.it: Mi manca, mi manca la nostra famiglia.

translation.en: Me too.
I miss her too.
What are you planning to do?
I just need to make sense of this.
-I need to know. -Just… Just leave it alone, okay?
translation.it: - Devo sapere. - Ma… Lascia perdere, ok?

translation.en: They already investigated, and they didn't find anything. Or the guy who tried to kill you.
translation.it: Hanno indagato e non hanno trovato niente. Nemmeno il tuo assalitore.

translation.en: It just was a dead-end conspiracy.
-I don't believe that. -[Rachel sighs]
You don't believe that.
I need to try.
Keep it close, Mike. -I don't know how long I'll be. -[Mike] Yes, sir.
translation.it: - Resta nei paraggi, non so quanto durerà. - Ok.

translation.en: -Mr. Keeley. -Ah.
Appreciate it. -Don't let me go dry tonight, will you? -[server chuckles]
translation.it: Grazie. Non farmi restare a secco, ok?

translation.en: [announcer] Good evening. I'm proud to kick off this first annual event
translation.it: Buonasera. Sono orgoglioso di dare il via a questo primo evento

translation.en: by introducing you to the CEO of BioPrime, Mr. Simon Keeley.
translation.it: presentando l'A.D. della BioPrime, il signor Simon Keeley.

translation.en: [man] Nice to see you, Simon.
Thank you.
Thank you very much. Hello, everyone.
T. S. Eliot said,
"We shall not cease in exploration."
We've joined forces with Goa Capital Partners
translation.it: Abbiamo unito le forze con la Goa Capital Partners

translation.en: in hopes of raising ten million dollars…
translation.it: sperando di raccogliere dieci milioni di dollari…

translation.en: For-- That's right. I know you got it.
Excuse me.
[Keeley, over speakers] For medicine and assistance…
for children in Africa.
translation.it: FUORI SERVIZIO …per i bambini in Africa. In India, scusate.

translation.en: India. Sorry. [laughs awkwardly]
translation.it: …per i bambini in Africa. In India, scusate.

translation.en: Either way, both places need a lot of help.
translation.it: Comunque, l'aiuto serve a entrambi i posti.

translation.en: -Thanks again for coming. -[guests clap]
Ladies and gentlemen, Mr. Simon Keeley.
Simon, Simon, Simon.
India, Africa? Africa, India?
You know what? I am so sick of doing your job for ya.
translation.it: Sono stufo di fare il tuo lavoro al posto tuo.

translation.en: I'm doing my job, Simon. Everyone's here because of me. There's some important people here.
translation.it: Io faccio il mio lavoro. Ho invitato io tutta la gente importante che vedi.

translation.en: Might want to mingle with more than your cocktails.
Sure, all right. Good to see ya.
-[drink spills] -What the fuck?
Who would…?
-[bodyguard 1] Sir? -[Keeley] You kidding? Give me a napkin.
translation.it: - Signore? - Scherza? Mi dia un cazzo di tovagliolo.

translation.en: …why I agree to participate in this bullshit in the first place.
translation.it: Perché accetto di partecipare a queste stronzate?

translation.en: -[auctioneer] Let's start the auction. -Fucking balls are wet.
translation.it: - Signori, iniziamo l'asta. - Ho le palle bagnate.

translation.en: -[bodyguard 2] It's out of order. -No shit. How'd you figure that out?
translation.it: - Non funziona. - Davvero, Sherlock? Come l'hai capito?

translation.en: Sir. Sir, there's another bathroom down the stairs.
translation.it: Signore, c'è un altro bagno di sotto.

translation.en: [Keeley] Well, let's go to it, then. All right?
Wait here. Keep a lookout.
-[Ray] Hmm? -What the… fuck? You were warned.
translation.it: - Ma che cazzo… - Ti avevo avvertito.

translation.en: If anything happened to her, I would hunt you down.
translation.it: Se fosse morta, ti avrei dato la caccia.

translation.en: All made her suffer, but she died because of you.
translation.it: Tutto l'ha fatta soffrire, ma è morta a causa tua.

translation.en: I didn't kill anyone, you psycho fuck. Cancer did.
translation.it: Io non ho ucciso nessuno, pazzo. È stato il cancro.

translation.en: You paid someone to kill Martin Bennett.
-What? Martin? -He was investigating your bribes.
What the… What are you talking about? I don't know any Martin Bennett.
translation.it: Di cosa stai parlando? Non conosco Martin Bennett.

translation.en: -You're the goddamn CEO of BioPrime. -All right.
translation.it: - Sei l'A.D. della BioPrime. - Va bene.

translation.en: I authorize a bribe now and again, but it's not like I read the fine print.
translation.it: Ogni tanto autorizzo delle mazzette, ma non mi faccio domande.

translation.en: [yelling] Okay, now, stop! Stop!
Fuck!
All right. Uh… [grunts]
It must have been Vinod Shah. Okay?
Nothing happens without his sign-off. He's the one that brought me on, okay?
translation.it: Nulla viene approvato senza la sua firma. È lui che mi ha assunto.

translation.en: You have no idea what you're getting into.
translation.it: Non sai in cosa ti stai cacciando.

translation.en: -Get him. -[tense music playing]
Here. Handle it. Do it!
-[blade slashes] -[bodyguard 2 screams] Fuck!
Come here, you little bitch!
-[Ray exhales shakily] -[auctioneer] Sold! 50,000 dollars.
[Rachel] Dad? You're hurt.
[Ray] I'm fine. I need you to pack up. Only what we need.
translation.it: Sto bene. Fai i bagagli. Prendi solo il necessario.

translation.en: -[Rachel] When are we coming back? -[Ray] We're not.
Is that his blood?
I… I had no choice. He had a gun.
translation.it: Non ho avuto scelta. Aveva una pistola.

translation.en: I told you not to do this.
translation.it: Ti avevo detto di non farlo.

translation.en: People are gonna come after us, aren't they?
[Ray] I don't know.
But we need to go. Please go pack our stuff.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare. Per favore, fai le valigie.

translation.en: [loudly] Go pack!
Mr. Asbury, I'm Special Agent Sarah Meeker.
translation.it: Signor Asbury, sono l'agente speciale Sarah Meeker.

translation.en: I already gave a statement.
[Meeker] Your partner, he took a bullet to the head tonight.
translation.it: Il suo collega è stato ucciso.

translation.en: Did you hear any gunshots?
[Asbury] No.
Did you hear anything at all before losing consciousness?
translation.it: Ha sentito niente, prima di perdere conoscenza?

translation.en: Somethin' about a woman.
Said, uh…
"All of them made her suffer."
-Or… "All made her suffer." I don't know. -What do you mean? All what? All who?
translation.it: - "Tutto l'ha fatta soffrire". Non so. - Tutti chi? Tutto cosa?

translation.en: -I don't know. -Okay.
-Do you remember anything else? -No.
-[Asbury sighs] -Thank you.
Come on.
But wait.
Whoever it was said they warned him.
translation.it: Quel tizio gli ha detto che l'aveva avvertito.

translation.en: They said they'd come for Mr. Keeley if anything happened to the woman.
translation.it: Che se fosse morta, gli avrebbe dato la caccia.

translation.en: All right. Thank you.
Let's do a check on all death threats Keeley may have gotten in the past.
translation.it: Controlla le minacce di morte ricevute da Keeley.

translation.en: [agent] You got it.
[Ray] It's a long drive to Toronto on these back roads.
translation.it: Il viaggio fino a Toronto è molto lungo.

translation.en: Especially if we're not talking.
-♪ Who throws the dice ♪ -You gonna come sit up here?
[Rachel grunts softly] Talk to Paloma.
We ran all the Keeley death threats, and we got a match.
translation.it: Abbiamo un riscontro tra le minacce a Keeley.

translation.en: Her name is Amanda Cooper. Died at Carnegie Medical a few years back.
translation.it: Si chiama Amanda Cooper. Morta al Carnegie Medical anni fa.

translation.en: Her husband's Oldsmobile was at the auction.
And we found this too.
[Keeley] It's impossible to put a price on.
[Ray] If my wife dies, it's your death sentence.
translation.it: Se mia moglie muore, sarà tua la condanna a morte.

translation.en: I will hunt you down and kill you with my bare hands.
translation.it: Ti troverò e ti ucciderò con le mie mani.

translation.en: -[Langley] We're gonna take-- -[Meeker hits key] "All made her suffer"?
translation.it: Facciamo una… - "Tutto l'ha fatta soffrire." - Già.

translation.en: -Right. [chuckles] -[Meeker exhales]
Let's put an APB out on Cooper's vehicle.
translation.it: Emettiamo un mandato sull'auto di Cooper.

translation.en: [attendant] Here you are.
[man] Got the ID on the driver.
How do you wanna handle this?
[Ray] Evening.
[Ray] I'll be right up.
-[phone rings] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] You're the agent assigned to what happened at the UNICEF fundraiser.
translation.it: Lei si occupa di quanto avvenuto all'asta, giusto?

translation.en: If you have any information, please call the tip line.
translation.it: Se ha informazioni, chiami la linea dedicata.

translation.en: -An agent will get back to you. -Yeah, I called the tip line.
-I told them I'm only talkin' to you. -And who am I speaking to?
translation.it: - Ho detto loro che parlerò solo con lei. - Ma chi è?

translation.en: Simon Keeley's death was an accident.
translation.it: La morte di Keeley è stata un incidente.

translation.en: -It was self-defense. -How do you know that? Who is this?
translation.it: Legittima difesa. Come lo sa? Chi parla?

translation.en: I'm gonna tell you everything that happened.
If you want a crime, look at…
look at what Keeley did.
How many cancer patients died because of him? Thousands? More?
translation.it: Quanti malati sono morti per causa sua? Migliaia? Di più?

translation.en: Where are you, Rachel?
-Goodbye. -Wait, I can help you.
My dad doesn't know I'm doing this.
translation.it: Mio padre non sa che sto chiamando.

translation.en: He's a good man. He… He just needs help.
translation.it: È un brav'uomo. Ha solo bisogno di aiuto.

translation.en: Do you need help?
I'm fine.
But I know you think he's guilty.
translation.it: So che pensate che sia colpevole.

translation.en: You've all made up your minds.
But you're wrong. He's a good, honest man.
translation.it: Ma si sbaglia, è un uomo buono e onesto.

translation.en: And I… need him.
translation.it: E io ho bisogno di lui.

translation.en: He's all I got.
Do you have cash?
Why?
When you can, get to a… a gas station or a Walmart.
translation.it: Vai in una stazione di servizio o in un Walmart, quando puoi.

translation.en: They have disposable phones, a burner.
translation.it: Vendono dei telefoni usa e getta.

translation.en: Okay? You get one, and you call me back.
My number is 412-046-4378.
Okay? No one will be able to trace it. Okay? It's safe.
Now say it back to me. It's 412-046-4--
-[call disconnects] -[quietly] Fuck.
Where'd you get that?
Did you steal that?
I'm just looking at it.
It's fine.
What? It's not like business is booming down there.
translation.it: Non è che gli affari gli vadano a gonfie vele.

translation.en: -Twenty dollars? Seriously? -[Rachel sighs] We're not done.
translation.it: Venti dollari? Davvero? Dove stai andando?

translation.en: Look, I know you've always taught me to do the right thing, okay?
translation.it: So che mi hai sempre insegnato a fare la cosa giusta,

translation.en: But we're here because of you.
translation.it: ma siamo qui per colpa tua.

translation.en: Rachel, look at me. Look at me. We gotta go.
[Ray] Come on.
-[pounding on door] -[agent] FBI! We have permission to gain entry.
[agent] Meeker.
Whoa. We definitely got our suspect.
[Meeker] It's Torres.
You got something?
What?
Where'd this happen?
Yeah, okay. Thank you.
So, that APB we put out on Ray Cooper's vehicle?
translation.it: Hai presente il mandato sull'auto di Cooper?

translation.en: It was spotted fleeing the scene of a double homicide 70 miles north of here.
translation.it: L'hanno avvistata mentre lasciava la scena di un duplice omicidio a nord.

translation.en: Rae, I don't think I can make it to Toronto.
translation.it: Rae, non credo di poter arrivare fino a Toronto.

translation.en: You know those men were sent to kill us.
I had no choice.
I just hate this.
[man] It runs, if you're askin'.
Like an odds-on favorite at the Kentucky Derby.
[hit man] You take cash?
[Ray] We need to stay off the road until I figure out what's goin' on.
translation.it: Dobbiamo evitare la strada finché non capiamo cosa succede.

translation.en: I'm gonna look around.
You wanna come with me?
Okay.
I'll be right back.
If they found us at the motel, they'll find us anywhere.
translation.it: Se ci hanno trovato al motel, ci troveranno ovunque.

translation.en: It's gonna be okay, Rae. I'm gonna keep you safe.
translation.it: Andrà tutto bene, Rae. Ti terrò al sicuro.

translation.en: They're coming to hurt you.
That's why I need to stop this. It needs to finish.
translation.it: Perciò devo mettere fine a questa storia.

translation.en: [Ray] I have to go after Shah.
[Rachel] You plan on using that?
No, but I need to be ready.
Do you know how to shoot it? It's not a hunting rifle.
translation.it: Sai sparare? Non è un fucile da caccia.

translation.en: -[gun cocks] -You know I do, Rae.
So, what is your plan?
It's better to have it and not need it than need it and not have it.
translation.it: Meglio averla e non usarla che non averla.

translation.en: We need protection.
Okay, so all the values you taught me growing up are out the window?
translation.it: Quindi tutti i valori che mi hai insegnato sin da piccola li gettiamo alle ortiche?

translation.en: As long as we're on the same page, dope.
Shit.
-[phone unlocks] -This is Meeker.
[Rachel] There are people that are coming after us. Rachel?
I don't know who. I don't know what he's gonna do, but…
translation.it: Non so chi siano, non so cosa faranno…

translation.en: Who, your dad?
Look, I've been tryin' to stop him, but I can't.
translation.it: Ho provato a fermarlo, ma non ci riesco.

translation.en: The only person he would ever listen to is my mom.
translation.it: L'unica persona che ascolterebbe è mia madre.

translation.en: -Can you tell me about her? -She…
She was a dancer.
[sighs] She had, uh…
tendinitis and stress fractures.
translation.it: la tendinite e varie fratture da stress.

translation.en: My dad, I mean, he sparred with guys who could take a punch.
translation.it: Mio padre si allenava con omoni forti come lui.

translation.en: But you could tell that they were in pain. You saw it. You know?
translation.it: Ma si vedeva che soffrivano, era palese. Capisce?

translation.en: But when my mom danced,
she'd just smile.
She always smiled.
She's tough. Like you.
You don't know me.
Debate,
gymnastics, judo junior Olympian, a 3.5 GPA.
translation.it: judo alle Olimpiadi giovanili, una media scolastica del 9.

translation.en: You've been checking up on me?
translation.it: Ha fatto ricerche su di me?

translation.en: Well, I'm an FBI agent.
I do have one question.
Who is… Paloma?
How do you know about Paloma?
I'm looking at a photo that says "Rachel and Paloma."
translation.it: Ho una foto con su scritto "Rachel e Paloma".

translation.en: I… wanted a pet. [sighs]
But we couldn't get one because of my mom's treatments, so…
translation.it: Ma non potevamo prenderlo per via delle cure della mamma.

translation.en: so she got me a stuffed bunny.
translation.it: E lei mi regalò un coniglietto di peluche.

translation.en: You…
She was always, uh, looking out for me.
translation.it: si prendeva sempre cura di me.

translation.en: Even when she couldn't. [sighs]
You'd make her proud.
And your dad.
[breathing shakily] I don't know what he's gonna do.
Hey. Listen to me.
You are in control.
Um, but I'm… I'm not. I'm really not.
-You are in control. -Stop saying that.
translation.it: - Tu hai il controllo. - La smetta di dirlo.

translation.en: You are in control. You are Rachel Cooper.
translation.it: Tu hai il controllo. Tu sei Rachel Cooper.

translation.en: Say your name.
-Rachel Cooper. -Say it again.
Rachel Cooper. [sighs]
That's it.
Turn the ignition on.
Tur--
What are you doin'?
-[clicks switch] -[Rachel] I'm coming with you.
[Ray] No, you're not.
-[Rachel] I'm not leaving you. -This isn't a debate.
translation.it: - Non ti lascio andare da solo. - Non si discute.

translation.en: -You can't do this without me. -I am not putting you in danger, Rae.
translation.it: Non puoi farlo senza di me. Non ti metterò in pericolo. Fine della discussione. Scendi.

translation.en: This conversation's over. Get outta the car.
translation.it: Non ti metterò in pericolo. Fine della discussione. Scendi.

translation.en: What about the motel?
That was unplanned. Pump the gas.
translation.it: Quello non era previsto. Dai gas.

translation.en: Promise you'll be back. Promise.
I'll be back.
Pinky swear.
I said, I promise.
Get outta the car.
[sighs] You always say I have to fight harder, so…
translation.it: Dici sempre che devo combattere più forte…

translation.en: What?
[gently] I need you to get outta the car.
Get outta the car.
As long as we're together, we're still a family.
translation.it: Se stiamo insieme, siamo una famiglia.

translation.en: Okay? So if you can't promise me that we'll be together, then I'm coming with you.
translation.it: Se non puoi promettermi che saremo insieme, allora verrò con te.

translation.en: [Ray] Not this time.
[quietly] Put your seat belt on.
Nice house.
How you gonna get in there?
-I'm not. -[tense music playing]
Dad.
[Ray] What's this guy doin'?
[Rachel] Look.
[Shah] Okay. Keep an eye on your sister. See you at the airport.
translation.it: Ok. Tieni d'occhio tua sorella. Ci vediamo all'aeroporto.

translation.en: Hold on.
This is Victor One. We've got a flat tire.
translation.it: Qui Victor One, abbiamo una gomma a terra.

translation.en: Stay behind.
[Shah] What is this?
Something's wrong. Get us out of here.
translation.it: Qualcosa non va. Portaci via di qui.

translation.en: Forward! Go! Go! Move, move!
Just break through it! Drive!
[driver] Come on! Let's go!
Fuck.
Get me out of here.
-Finish him. -[bodyguard] Go!
[Ray] Rachel, someone else is here. Stay in the car.
translation.it: Rachel, c'è qualcun altro. Resta in auto.

translation.en: You're gonna tell me why Martin Bennett was killed.
translation.it: Dimmi perché Martin Bennett è stato ucciso.

translation.en: There's nowhere to go. We can get to anyone.
translation.it: Non puoi nasconderti, possiamo trovare chiunque.

translation.en: You killed a reporter to cover up bribes. Who were they paid out to?
translation.it: Hai ucciso un giornalista per coprire delle mazzette. Per chi?

translation.en: Soon, some powerful people are gonna be looking for a little girl who lost both her parents.
translation.it: Presto qualcuno cercherà una ragazza che ha perso entrambi i genitori.

translation.en: [Rachel, echoing] Daddy!
-I know there's others. Who are they? -You don't have what it takes.
translation.it: - So che ce ne sono altri. Chi sono? - Non hai le palle.

translation.en: -[gunshot] -[Ray grunts] Whoa!
[Ray] Go!
Dad?
-[engine cuts out] -Why can't you just listen?
You should've stayed in the car. You shouldn't have followed me to the subway.
translation.it: Dovevi restare in auto, e non dovevi seguirmi nella metro.

translation.en: That was the man from the subway.
We have to go.
Let's go.
Look.
-Hold on. -[Rachel] What are you doing?
[Ray, softly] Sit down.
If anything goes wrong, you tell them everything.
translation.it: Se qualcosa va storto, racconta tutto.

translation.en: Your business with me is done.
Shah's dead.
Hmm. Shah didn't hire me.
My contract is to take out anyone who can implicate my employer.
translation.it: Io devo eliminare chiunque possa incriminare il mio capo.

translation.en: Who else are you hunting?
Only the one sitting next to me.
translation.it: Alla persona seduta accanto a me.

translation.en: Something for you, darling?
I know your struggle.
I do.
The village I grew up in,
we were farmers.
I worked in the fields with my father.
translation.it: Lavoravo nei campi con mio padre.

translation.en: And one day, a group of rebels came.
translation.it: Un giorno arrivò un gruppo di ribelli.

translation.en: They slaughtered my entire village. Everyone. Whole family, friends.
translation.it: Massacrarono tutto il villaggio. La mia famiglia, amici compresi.

translation.en: I was able to hide in the weeds.
Now, you gotta understand, I was just a kid, know that?
translation.it: Devi capire che ero solo un bambino.

translation.en: In such pain, with such… rage
that for years, I hunted them one by one.
translation.it: ed ero così arrabbiato che ho dato la caccia a tutti loro.

translation.en: -Then you understand. -[hit man] I do.
You see, what I've learned in that process is that there will always be an opposing force.
translation.it: Quello che ho imparato nel mentre, però, è che ci sarà sempre una forza nemica,

translation.en: No amount of revenge can change that.
So you see, in this case,
you are my village,
and I am the opposing force.
translation.it: e io sono la forza nemica.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Well, there's three ways this goes down.
One, I tell those cops who we are
translation.it: Uno: dico ai poliziotti chi siamo

translation.en: and this gets real ugly for both of us.
translation.it: e la cosa si mette male per entrambi.

translation.en: Two,
I walk out the front door,
spend the rest of my life hiding in the four corners of this earth,
translation.it: passo la vita a nascondermi continuamente

translation.en: and neither of us get what we want.
Or three,
you tell me who hired you.
translation.it: tu mi dici chi ti ha assunto.

translation.en: We both know I'm gonna go after them.
And when I do,
you can try to take another shot at me.
This way, at least one of us gets what we want.
translation.it: In questo modo, almeno uno di noi ottiene ciò che vuole.

translation.en: Nah.
No, you've killed a few men, but…
their deaths are still fresh in your eyes.
You're a dilettante in my world.
translation.it: Per me, è roba da dilettanti.

translation.en: I never set out to kill anyone.
Not like you.
You are not innocent.
You knew going after powerful people was a dangerous business.
translation.it: Sapevi che prendertela coi potenti era pericoloso.

translation.en: You jumped. I'm just the pavement closing in.
translation.it: Hai fatto un salto. Io sono solo il marciapiede su cui ti schianterai.

translation.en: The person you're looking for.
The senator.
See you in Pittsburgh.
I'll see ya soon.
Rothman, you have kids.
Does the idea of Rachel Cooper being dragged through all of this bother you at all?
translation.it: L'idea che Rachel Cooper venga trascinata in questa storia non ti turba?

translation.en: Every case we work has me worried about my kids one way or another.
translation.it: Mi preoccupo sempre per i bambini, quando lavoro a un caso.

translation.en: I keep thinking about her.
I mean, how's…
how's a kid supposed to get past all that she's seen?
translation.it: come fa una ragazzina a superare tutte queste cose?

translation.en: I feel like…
I feel like I need to protect her somehow.
-Just do the work-- -[agent] Memo came through.
translation.it: - Fa' il tuo lavoro. - C'è un messaggio.

translation.en: -Search crew found Cooper's vehicle. -Where?
translation.it: - Hanno trovato l'auto di Cooper. - Dove?

translation.en: [agent] In the woods, 20 miles outside Shah's compound.
translation.it: Nei boschi, a 32 km dal complesso di Shah.

translation.en: Looks like local PD got a call this morning that a tow truck was stolen at a nearby location.
translation.it: La polizia ha ricevuto una chiamata per un carro attrezzi rubato in zona.

translation.en: We need eyes on all street cameras on Route 8.
-[agent] I'm on it. -Thank you.
Okay. Fort Pitt Tunnel. Only 12 minutes away.
translation.it: Ok, mancano 12 minuti al Fort Pitt Tunnel.

translation.en: Hey, guys. We got a hit on that tow truck. It's headed back to the city.
translation.it: Il carro attrezzi rubato sta tornando in città.

translation.en: [dispatcher 1, on radio] Suspect is in a red tow truck. 10-80.
License plate Romeo Tango One Seven
Uniform Alpha Sierra.
[officer 1] We may have something here. Westbound on Liberty passing 16th.
translation.it: Forse l'abbiamo visto. Sulla Liberty, verso ovest oltre la 16esima.

translation.en: [Rachel] The chopper! It's on us.
[officer 1] We've got eyes on the suspect. Making a right turn on 9th.
translation.it: Vediamo il carro attrezzi. Sta girando a destra sulla nona.

translation.en: North on 9th. Picking up speed. Making a run for it.
translation.it: Va verso nord, accelera. Prova a scappare.

translation.en: All right. Hold on, baby.
[Rachel] Oh shit!
[officer 2, over speaker] Police! Stop the vehicle now!
-Where's the chopper? -It's on your right. On your right.
-Get outta the way! -[people scream]
Oh shit!
-God damn it! Hold on. Hang on! -[Rachel screams]
[dispatcher 1, on radio] All units, suspect is armed and dangerous.
translation.it: A tutte le unità. L'obiettivo è armato e pericoloso.

translation.en: I repeat, armed and dangerous.
[Ray] The game's letting out.
[quietly] Oh shit!
-[dispatcher 2] Got eyes on the suspect. -[officer 3] On the move!
[officer 4, on radio] Suspect on foot. I repeat, suspect on foot.
translation.it: Obiettivo a piedi. Ripeto, a piedi.

translation.en: [dispatcher 2] Suspect is entering PNC Park.
-[Meeker] Everybody clear. FBI! -[Rothman] Move! Out of the way!
translation.it: - Andatevene tutti. FBI! - Muoversi, via da qui.

translation.en: [Meeker] If he's down here, we squeeze him out. I'll take the upper level.
translation.it: Se è qui, lo circonderemo. Io vado al livello superiore.

translation.en: PPD, cover this level. The rest, go upstairs.
translation.it: PPD, coprite questo livello. Il resto di sopra.

translation.en: -[officer 5] Suspect spotted. -[crowd cheering]
Suspect spotted on the upper level.
Get me agents to the roof, now!
[Rothman] Move!
-[officer 7] I got eyes on. -[Rothman] Copy.
[Meeker] Wait!
Wait.
Okay. [gasps]
It wasn't right what happened to you. I understand that.
translation.it: Quello che ti è successo non è giusto, lo capisco.

translation.en: Look, no one is gonna hurt you.
It's me. I'm here to help.
translation.it: Sono io. Sono qui per aiutarti.

translation.en: Okay?
-[somber music playing] -I don't know you.
Yes, you do. We've…
We've been talking.
No. Paloma.
You told me your stuffed bunny's name was Paloma.
translation.it: Mi hai detto che il tuo coniglietto si chiamava Paloma.

translation.en: Remember?
It wasn't supposed to be like this.
[Meeker] Your father was a good man.
[Meeker] You are not him.
-[Meeker] Say your name. -[Rachel gasps]
[Meeker] You are in control.
[sighs] Fuck.
You're nothing but a scared little--
translation.it: Non sei altro che una piccola…

translation.en: [hit man] Rachel.
I'll see ya soon.
[echoing] Say your name.
[Ray, echoing] Rachel.
We're gonna be okay.
[Meeker] He shouldn't have been killed.
Come on, just… say… your name.
[Meeker] Just say your name!
Yeah.
[dispatcher 2] We have a positive identification of the suspect. Her name is Rachel Cooper.
translation.it: Abbiamo identificato l'obiettivo. Si chiama Rachel Cooper.

translation.en: No. No, no, no, Rachel!
[Meeker] Her name is Rachel Cooper.
Eighteen years of age.
[paramedic] Any family to contact? [Meeker] Both parents deceased.
translation.it: - Familiari da contattare? - Entrambi i genitori sono morti.

translation.en: [driver] No!
[Meeker] Rachel, stop!
There you are.
I'm scared.
I feel like the whole world's gone crazy.
translation.it: Mi sembra che il mondo sia impazzito.

translation.en: Or maybe it's just me.
I'm tired.
Nobody cares about stopping them.
Besides me.
Will I ever get to see you and Mom again?
translation.it: Riuscirò mai a rivedere te e la mamma?

translation.en: [softly] We're with you now.
[Morgan] The fight begins here.
Big business and corporate interests have corroded our politics.
translation.it: Il commercio e gli interessi aziendali hanno corroso la nostra politica.

translation.en: [Morgan] And I believe that our country is on the verge of imploding.
translation.it: E io credo che il nostro Paese stia per implodere.

translation.en: Of rotting. Rotting from the inside out.
[Morgan] We need someone who will clean…
[Morgan and crowd] …out the rot! -Clean out the rot! -[crowd cheers]
translation.it: - Il marcio! - Che raschi via il marcio.

translation.en: Today, I am announcing my bid to be your next senator
translation.it: Oggi annuncio la mia candidatura per diventare la prossima senatrice

translation.en: from the great state of Pennsylvania.
[chuckles] That's right.
And to big business politics,
we have one thing to say.
translation.it: abbiamo solo una cosa da dire:

translation.en: This is our state,
and it is not for sale!
[staffer] Well done.
Entering the race is just the beginning.
Let's focus on what we wanna do when we win.
translation.it: Concentriamoci sul da farsi quando vinceremo.

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Ray] Where'd you get this?
-It's Mom's. -[Ray chuckles]
Actually, it's mine.
I took your mom to a Steelers game shortly after we met,
translation.it: L'ho portata a vedere gli Steelers dopo averla conosciuta.

translation.en: and it was freezing, and I gave her my jacket. And she never gave it back.
translation.it: Faceva freddissimo, così gliel'ho data. E lei l'ha tenuta per sé.

translation.en: Well, now it's my turn to steal it from her.
translation.it: Ora tocca a me rubarla a lei.

translation.en: [Rachel] It's my turn to steal it from her.
translation.it: Tocca a me rubarla a lei.

translation.en: [Ray] Come on, baby.
Get up.
[Ray, emphatically] Get up, sweet girl.
[Rachel] Calling the FBI.
And when they get here,
you're gonna tell them everything you did with BioPrime.
translation.it: gli racconteremo ciò che hai fatto con la BioPrime.

translation.en: Go ahead. Or better yet, let me.
translation.it: Fai pure. Anzi, li chiamo io.

translation.en: I think the FBI is looking for you,
translation.it: Credo che l'FBI stia cercando te,

translation.en: You know me?
You're all over the news.
I've seen what you did.
[Morgan] You bring the FBI here, and…
who do you think they're gonna arrest?
-The crazy girl who killed five men? -No.
translation.it: La pazza che ha ucciso cinque uomini? O me?

translation.en: -[Morgan] Or me? -No. We never meant to hurt anyone.
translation.it: La pazza che ha ucciso cinque uomini? O me? No, noi non volevamo ferire nessuno.

translation.en: I understand, and I can help you.
I think I'm the only one who can.
translation.it: Credo di poterlo fare solo io.

translation.en: -I can make this nightmare end. -Shut up!
translation.it: - Porre finire a questo incubo. - Zitta.

translation.en: -You're the one behind BioPrime. -I wrestled them into submission.
translation.it: - Ci sei tu dietro la BioPrime. - Io li ho sottomessi.

translation.en: I got them to lower their prices. Affordable treatment. And you cleaned out the rot.
translation.it: - Ho fatto abbassare i prezzi delle cure. - Hai raschiato via il marcio.

translation.en: I'm fighting for you, sweetheart.
When I saw you on CNN when my mom was in the hospital,
translation.it: Ti ho vista alla CNN quando mia madre era in ospedale.

translation.en: I thought you could actually save her.
I believed in you.
-[shakily] You still can. -How?
[inhales sharply] I know people at the DOJ. They can make the charges against you go away.
translation.it: Ho contatti al Dipartimento di Giustizia. Possono cancellare le accuse contro di te.

translation.en: And you can have a life.
What you've been through, what happened to you, was wrong, Rachel.
translation.it: Quello che ti è successo e che hai passato è sbagliato.

translation.en: The trauma you suffered.
Don't you think they'd want me to help you, sweetheart?
translation.it: Non credi che vorrebbero che ti aiutassi, tesoro?

translation.en: -[gasps] -Stop calling me that. You're a liar.
translation.it: Smettila di chiamarmi così! Sei una bugiarda.

translation.en: You were with BioPrime even then.
translation.it: Tu eri già dalla parte della BioPrime.

translation.en: You helped them take away
a cheap and lifesaving medication for my mom.
translation.it: una medicina più economica che avrebbe salvato mia madre.

translation.en: I fought against them! [panting]
You took their bribe, and you gave them exclusive contracts.
translation.it: Hai preso le loro mazzette in cambio di contratti esclusivi.

translation.en: You're responsible for ordering the hit on Martin Bennett.
translation.it: Hai ordinato l'omicidio di Martin Bennett.

translation.en: You killed my dad.
[softly] Now tell the truth.
-[Morgan gasps] -[firmly] Tell me the truth.
Yeah.
I took the bribe.
I ordered the hit.
You don't understand anything. You're so young.
translation.it: Tu non capisci niente. Sei troppo giovane.

translation.en: The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.it: Il candidato con più soldi vince.

translation.en: That's how it works.
Was it worth it?
Was it worth it?
Security?
[yelling] Security!
She kills Keeley and runs. Tries to escape, but something or someone
translation.it: Uccide Keeley e scappa. O almeno ci prova. Ma qualcosa o qualcuno la fa tornare, nonostante il rischio di cattura.

translation.en: drove her back here, despite knowing she might be caught.
translation.it: Ma qualcosa o qualcuno la fa tornare, nonostante il rischio di cattura.

translation.en: [Rothman] Yeah, but she got her revenge. Why come back?
translation.it: Si era vendicata. Perché non sparire?

translation.en: -[agent] Just came in. -Thank you, sir.
-Holy shit. -[Meeker] What?
[Rothman] Rachel Cooper was spotted
translation.it: Rachel Cooper è stata avvistata al raduno di Diana Morgan

translation.en: at Diana Morgan's campaign rally yesterday afternoon.
translation.it: Rachel Cooper è stata avvistata al raduno di Diana Morgan ieri pomeriggio.

translation.en: [Meeker] What was she doing there?
[reporter on TV] The fugitive from last night's assassination attempt…
translation.it: La responsabile del tentato omicidio di ieri sera…

translation.en: [Rachel] Thanks.
…on Diana Morgan is still on the loose.
Pittsburgh police are asking anyone with information to please come forward.
translation.it: Chiunque abbia informazioni è pregato di farsi avanti.

translation.en: [Rothman] First Keeley, then Shah, now a congresswoman?
translation.it: Prima Keeley, poi Shah, ora un membro del Congresso?

translation.en: It just seems so bizarre.
[Meeker] Rachel clearly knows something.
translation.it: Sa qualcosa che noi non sappiamo.

translation.en: Let's go through Diana Morgan's campaign donations.
translation.it: Controlliamo le donazioni alla campagna di Diana Morgan.

translation.en: [Meeker] Look at this. Rachel Cooper just sent us something.
translation.it: Guarda. Rachel Cooper ci ha inviato una cosa.

translation.en: [Morgan on recording] I took the bribe. I ordered the hit.
translation.it: Ho preso le mazzette. Ho ordinato l'omicidio.

translation.en: The candidate with the most money wins.
translation.it: Il candidato con più soldi vince.

translation.en: That's how it works.
[reporter on TV] …developments in the assassination attempt.
According to sources, the FBI has arrested the congresswoman
translation.it: Secondo delle fonti, l'FBI ha arrestato la deputata

translation.en: regarding her connection to the recent murders of BioPrime executives
translation.it: in relazione agli omicidi dei dirigenti della BioPrime,

translation.en: Simon Keeley and Vinod Shah
and the two-year-old unsolved murders of Martin Bennett and Ray Cooper.
translation.it: e agli omicidi irrisolti da due anni di Martin Bennett e Ray Cooper.

translation.en: Neither BioPrime or the FBI would comment on this ongoing investigation.
translation.it: Né la BioPrime né l'FBI hanno voluto rilasciare dichiarazioni.

translation.en: …Pennsylvania is allegedly connected to the deaths of reporter Martin Bennett
translation.it: …la Senatrice pare collegata alle morti del giornalista Martin Bennett

translation.en: and Rachel Cooper's father nearly two years ago.
translation.it: e del padre di Rachel Cooper, quasi due anni fa.

translation.en: [Ray] The past is like a dream.
translation.it: Il passato è come un sogno.

translation.en: A mosaic of images and feelings that offers some truth about how we got here,
translation.it: Un mosaico di immagini ed emozioni che rivela come siamo arrivati dove siamo.

translation.en: even if details have blurred with time.
translation.it: Anche se i dettagli diventano sfocati.

translation.en: Parents and their children.
Where do we stop…
[Rachel] …and they begin?
